column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=Be the Person You Were Meant to Be
#Text=If you are reading this , you have found yourself not content with the way your life is headed .
#Text=Maybe you 're just wanting a little self-help .
#Text=Possibly none of these apply to you and you 're just reading this because you feel like it .

#Text=Whatever it may be , you 're reading it , and if you finish this article I can guarantee that you will learn something about yourself , something that you may desperately be seeking or needing at this point in your life .
#Text=Steps
#Text=Move forward .
#Text=Have you made mistakes ?
#Text=Of course you have .
#Text=Take a second to close your eyes and tell yourself that you 're normal , it 's normal to make mistakes .
#Text=Have you ever done something that you wish you could take back ?
#Text=Something that you would n't tell anyone ?
#Text=That 's normal too .
#Text=Today is the day that you become the person that you were always meant to be .
#Text=That ca n't happen if you have baggage .
#Text=Leave the past in the past .
#Text=You my friend , have a chance to restart , and all you have to do is forget all the bad things that you did , all the things that has happened to you , and just move forward .
#Text=Accept yourself .

#Text=We all wish we could be someone else , wish that maybe for just one day we would n't be so insecure , have the need to buy material things , as if that would make us more perfect , or more like that one person you wish you could be .
#Text=But let me tell you something ; someone looks at you every day and thinks " Man , I wish I was like them . "
#Text=You may be saying to yourself " yeah , right . "
#Text=But it 's so true .

#Text=When we can accept ourselves the way we are , and not always try to be better than someone , we could finally see that no one can be compared to us , no one can make you look bad , because your were made the way you are for a reason , and no one can take that away from you .
#Text=When you find self-acceptance you will be that much closer to living a full and happy life you deserve .
#Text=Love yourself .

#Text=You ca n't change what you did or who you were , but absolutely nothing can prevent you from being the person you want to be , from shaping yourself into the human that you want everyone to see when they look at you .
#Text=You 're so lovable with all your flaws , and you do n't even need someone to tell you that .
#Text=If you ca n't love yourself , than why should others love you ?
#Text=Grow .
#Text=You 're constantly growing .
#Text=Physically , that is .
#Text=Today , grow spiritually .
#Text=Accept yourself , try new things , grow in knowledge of yourself .
#Text=Inside all of us , there is a light .
#Text=A light that burns brighter than any flame .
#Text=This light cannot and will not be extinguished , only hidden .
#Text=Why , oh why , would you hide such a mesmerizing light ?
#Text=Could it be that some one else may overpower yours ?
#Text=Perhaps another person told you that yours is not beautiful ?
#Text=Friend , yours is the most beautiful of anyone , none can overpower yours , for yours is unique .
#Text=The hard part is not keeping this light on , but finding it , yours has been hidden for so long that you may not find it .
#Text=Show the world your light , and let them see that your a person of such greatness that all will love you and respect you .
#Text=Tips
#Text=Love is an action , not a feeling .
#Text=Love is the most natural thing in the world .
#Text=Love everyone , and your true self will shine through .
#Text=Warnings
#Text=Do n't forget how loved you are .
